titleStmt.title: Collections of acute diseases, the fourth part It contains all that the learn'd and experienc'd Dr. Sydenham has written of agues, of a pleurisie, of a bastard peripneumonia, of a quinsey, and of the cholera morbus. And all that the famous Dr. Willis has written of a peripneumonia.
Collections of acute diseases. Part 4.
titleStmt.author: Pechey, John, 1655-1716.
Sydenham, Thomas, 1624-1689.
Willis, Thomas, 1621-1675.
